name: suny canton capstone
description:
This is a game made for the Suny Canton capstone Project. We work with a team of 10+ people to get this demo running.

INTRODUCTION: 

the game is split between two modes melee and attack. In attack mode, you have a gun that shoots a limited amount of steam at enemies. to refuel you need to switch to melee mode and hit enemies with your ax this is risky and you will lose health. To regain health you need to switch back to attack mode

Press Q to switch modes:
